long_description: The Leatherman Juice C2 Multitool is extremely thin, but it still has a corkscrew, pliers, wire cutters and 4 screwdrivers to get the job done when you're in the woods or on the road. Also includes a high-carbon stainless-steel knife blade that is strong and sharp, a bottle opener and a can opener. 4 screwdrivers include a Phillips screwdriver, medium/large flat-head screwdriver, small flat-head screwdriver and an extra-small flat-head screwdriver. Anodized-aluminum exterior stands up to abrasion and corrosion. Lanyard attachment lets you attach the Leatherman Juice C2 Multitool to a backpack zipper, carabiner or keychain.
short_description: The Leatherman Juice C2 Multitool is extremely thin, but it still has a corkscrew, pliers, wire cutters and 4 screwdrivers to get the job done when you're in the woods or on the road.
